com.gensym.classes
Class G2_ItemWrapper

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.Component
        |
        +--com.gensym.classes.G2_ItemWrapper
public class G2_ItemWrapper
extends Component
implements ItemListener, ObjectChangeListener

This class is the root class of all wrapped G2Beans created from the G2BeanBuilder. It sub classes java.awt.component so that it can be used with in a visual development tool such as BeanBox.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Method Detail

getSourceURL

public String getSourceURL()
Getter for the sourceURL property. The source URL specifies a G2 item within a specific G2.
Returns:
The current value of the sourceURL property.

setSourceURL

public void setSourceURL(String url)
                  throws G2AccessException,
                         G2AccessInitiationException,
                         ConnectionTimedOutException
Set the sourceURL property, which specifies the G2 item to wrap within this component bean. e.g. g2:://localhost:1111/A-G2-ITEM Where A-G2-Item is located within a G2 server at host name localhost port 1111.
Parameters:
url - The sourceUrl string

addG2_ItemWrapperListener

public void addG2_ItemWrapperListener(G2_ItemWrapperListener il)
Add a G2_ItemWrapperListener to the ItemWrapperListener list. The G2_ItemWrapperListener will be informed when a G2 Item is successfully received and accesible from this object.
Parameters:
il - The G2_ItemWrapperListener to add.

removeG2_ItemWrapperListener

public void removeG2_ItemWrapperListener(G2_ItemWrapperListener il)
Remove a G2_ItemWrapperListener from the ItemWrapperListener list.
Parameters:
il - The G2_ItemWrapperListener to remove.

getG2ItemFetched

public boolean getG2ItemFetched()
Gives the item that this G2_ItemWrapper is wrapping
Returns:
true if this object is currently wrapping a G2 Item.

setG2ItemFetched

public void setG2ItemFetched(boolean status)
                      throws G2AccessException,
                             ConnectionTimedOutException,
                             G2AccessInitiationException
This method enables the setting of this property. If set true when previously false, then the sourceURL will be used to attempt to fetch a reference to a G2 Item. If set false when previouly true any refernce G2 Item will be dropped.
Parameters:
status - The new value for the g2ItemFetched property.

wrapG2Item

public boolean wrapG2Item(Item theItem)
                   throws G2AccessException
This method wraps up a given G2 Item, do not us the sourceURL.
Parameters:
theItem - The G2 Item to wrap.

fetchG2Item

public boolean fetchG2Item()
                    throws G2AccessException,
                           ConnectionTimedOutException,
                           G2AccessInitiationException
Force The G2 Item to be fetch using the sourceURL field, this method is equivalent to performing setG2ItemFetched(true).
Returns:
true if the call item was fetched

getConnection

public G2Access getConnection()
Get the current connection used to get the wrapped Item.
Returns:
the G2Access used to fetch the G2 wrapped item from G2, null if none.

setScaleImageToFit

public void setScaleImageToFit(boolean newScaleImageToFit)
Get the current setting for setScaleImageToFit.
Parameters:
boolean - flag controling if icon image is to be scaled to fit within the bounds of this item

isScaleImageToFit

public boolean isScaleImageToFit()
This method allows the setting of the scaleImageToFit attribute; which indicates if the image for this bean is to be scaled so as to fit within the bounds of the bean or not.
Returns:
boolean flag representing this property

setUseG2Icon

public void setUseG2Icon(boolean newUseG2Icon)
This method allows the setUseG2Icon property to be set. If true, indicates that the bean will use the G2 icon for the class as its graphical representaton. If false the bean will display the image as specified in its bean info file.
Parameters:
boolean - flag to set this Java object to use the G2 icon of the G2 item it represents

isUseG2Icon

public boolean isUseG2Icon()
This method returns a boolean value representing the property. If true, indicates that the bean will use the G2 icon for the class as its graphical representaton. If false the bean will display the image as specified in its bean info file.
Returns:
boolean flag representing this property

setShowIconUpdates

public void setShowIconUpdates(boolean newShowIconUpdates)
This method enables the setting of the showIconUpdates attribute.
Parameters:
boolean - flag to set this Java object to show icon color and variable changes in the icon of the G2 item it represents

isShowIconUpdates

public boolean isShowIconUpdates()
This method allows the boolean value of the showIconUpdates attribute to be obtained.
Returns:
boolean flag if true this Java object shows icon color and variable changes in the icon of the G2 item it represents

readIconImage

protected Image readIconImage()
Return the Image that is used to represent this bean. each of the classes has an overide for this method

setSize

public void setSize(Dimension d)
Method override of the setSize method, If the G2 item that this bean represents has been fetched, then set size also change the size of the icon
Parameters:
d - - the Dimension describing the new size for the icon
Overrides:
setSize in class Component

okToCallG2

protected boolean okToCallG2()
                      throws G2AccessException
Check if its is OK to call into G2. G2 must be RUNNING for G2_ItemWrappers to communicate with G2.

setEnableUIForMessages

public void setEnableUIForMessages(boolean state)
Set the status of UI information message displaying. Some UI builders can hide Exceptions. If set information and exception messages will be shown via a popup dialog.

getEnableUIForMessages

Get the status of UI information messagee displaying. Some UI builders can hide Exceptions. If set information and exception messages will be shown via a popup dialog.

itemModified

public void itemModified(ItemEvent e)
This method is from the itemListener interface. It will be called when the wrapped item is modified. Mormally the method will signal a G2 attribute change, and will therefore fire a Property change event.
Specified by:
itemModified in interface ItemListener
Parameters:
e - An ItemEvent detailing the modification

itemDeleted

public void itemDeleted(ItemEvent e)
This method is called from the itemListener interface. It will be called when the wrapped item is deleted. This bean will remove all references to the deleted G2 Item.
Specified by:
itemDeleted in interface ItemListener
Parameters:
e - An ItemEvent detailing the deletion
